name: Data Analyst/Project Manager (Ozon Seller Development & Analytics Team)
description:
OZON Marketplace Seller Service Development & Analytics Team (previously CorpDev Team, exGoldman Sachs, NES / HSE / ICEF graduates, direct reporting to OZON’s CFO / Marketplace Director) is expanding and seeking for bright last year student or recent BA/MA graduate with a deep interest and knowledge in data analysis to join us as an Intern with further performance-driven promotion to fulltime Analyst position. We present a unique opportunity to improve your technical skills, work with big data, learn how to process it, learn different ways of reporting in the form of chatbots, reports in PowerBi, Tableau. This is an opportunity to work on real projects, solve business problems and come up with extraordinary ways to analyze data.

We present a unique opportunity to be engaged in huge business development projects related to Marketplace’s clients (mostly Ozon sellers) development. You will immerse yourself into all processes of Sellers’ Support platform and play an important role in systematic work to eliminate the most significant pains and create new services for sellers on the platform within all contacts with Ozon Marketplace. You will dive into operational processes and create sophisticated analytics to optimize the conversion from newcomers to active sellers as well as to reduce churn of active partners from the platform.

What can we offer?

  • Wide range of responsibilities, including business analytics, data mining, market research, project management with full personal responsibility
  • Close cooperation with best-in-class e-commerce Team
  • A-class office at Moscow-city business center (49’ floor)
  • Competitive compensation and fast performance-driven growth track

Requirements:

  • Top university with Economics/Finance/Math major – recent graduate or last year student
  • Knowledge of mathematical statistics, SQL, Python (pandas, numpy), basic knowledge of machine learning
  • Tableau, PowerBI or Grafana
  • Plus: 1-2 years of experience in business / operational teams in e-com/tech companies (Yandex/Mail, etc.) consulting or data firms
  • Plus: deep business understanding, essential knowledge of Corporate Finance / Accounting
  • Strong quantitative, analytical and problem-solving skills, communication and interpersonal skills
  • Availability to work full-time and hard-working
  • Experienced Excel and PowerPoint user
  • Fluent English (verbal and written)
branded_description:
Ozon is one of the largest e-commerce companies in Russia, ranked #4 in e-commerce top-100 index 2018. Also enters The Most Expensive Runet Companies 2019 ranking by Forbes Russia. The company was founded in 1998. Today Ozon offers more than 5 mln SKUs to its customers and represents 25 merchandise categories. Its logistics infrastructure includes approximately 200 thousand sq meters of fulfillment centers as well as 4200 courriers, 5400 pickup points and more than 7800 automated lockers. Every second Russian citizen can get his/her order from Ozon in 24 hours.

OZON Marketplace Seller Service Development & Analytics Team (previously CorpDev Team, exGoldman Sachs, NES / HSE / ICEF graduates, direct reporting to OZON’s CFO / Marketplace Director) is expanding and seeking for bright last year student or recent BA/MA graduate with a deep interest and knowledge in data analysis to join us as an Intern with further performance-driven promotion to fulltime Analyst position.
